block_comment: This block of code is a delay system for the signal "ras_n". It performs its function by using the Verilog non-blocking assignment operator (<=) to apply the "BUS_DELAY" time delay to the "ras_n" signal. Consequently, the "ras_n" signal will be delayed and reassigned to the "ras_n_in" variable whenever there is a change in the "ras_n" signal.
